price: 31. Bastó con enviarles un solo grito (del ángel Gabriel) y quedaron destruidos, como si fueran forraje seco y pisoteado.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmi al-muḥ'taẓiri
